en: Transform your pickup truck into a fully functional mobile home with our comprehensive selection of truck camper equipment and accessories. Whether you're planning weekend getaways or extended road trips, our range includes everything needed to create a comfortable and efficient living space on your truck bed. From slide-in campers and pop-up shells to essential amenities like storage solutions, electrical systems, and insulation kits, we offer practical and affordable options sourced directly from manufacturers. Our truck camper collection focuses on durability, space optimization, and ease of installation, ensuring your vehicle conversion meets your specific travel needs. Whether you're a weekend warrior or a full-time nomad, discover reliable gear that maximizes your truck's potential while maintaining factory-direct pricing. Explore our selection of camper shells, tie-down systems, and interior components designed to enhance comfort and functionality on every adventure.

Create a comfortable and functional living space inside your RV with our comprehensive selection of interior equipment and accessories. Our range includes everything needed to transform your recreational vehicle into a true home on wheels, from furniture and storage solutions to appliances and decorative elements. Whether you're renovating an existing RV or customizing a new one, we offer practical and affordable options sourced directly from manufacturers. Our RV interior collection focuses on space efficiency, durability, and style, ensuring every component enhances your mobile living experience. From compact kitchen appliances and space-saving furniture to climate control systems and lighting solutions, discover reliable gear that maximizes comfort and functionality. Whether you're a weekend camper or a full-time RVer, explore our selection of interior accessories designed to make your RV feel like home while maintaining factory-direct pricing.

Protect and enhance your RV's exterior with our extensive range of equipment and accessories designed for durability, functionality, and style. Our selection includes everything needed to maintain and upgrade your recreational vehicle's outer components, from awnings and covers to lighting systems and storage solutions. Whether you're looking to extend your living space, protect your investment, or improve your RV's appearance, we offer practical and affordable options sourced directly from manufacturers. Our RV exterior collection features weather-resistant materials, easy installation, and long-lasting performance that withstands the elements. From retractable awnings and solar panels to bike racks and storage compartments, discover reliable gear that enhances your RV's capabilities. Whether you're preparing for a weekend trip or a long-term adventure, explore our selection of exterior accessories designed to maximize your RV's potential while maintaining factory-direct pricing.

Equip your van for adventure with our comprehensive selection of van conversion equipment and accessories designed for comfort, functionality, and efficiency. Our range includes everything needed to transform your van into a fully functional mobile living space, from insulation and flooring to electrical systems and storage solutions. Whether you're building a weekend camper van or a full-time home on wheels, we offer practical and affordable options sourced directly from manufacturers. Our van equipment collection focuses on space optimization, durability, and ease of installation, ensuring your conversion meets your specific travel and living needs. From roof vents and solar power systems to modular furniture and kitchen components, discover reliable gear that maximizes your van's potential. Whether you're a DIY enthusiast or working with a professional converter, explore our selection designed to create the perfect mobile home while maintaining factory-direct pricing.

Keep your vehicle running smoothly and safely with our extensive selection of auto parts and automotive accessories sourced directly from manufacturers. Our range includes essential components for maintenance, repair, and performance enhancement, from engine parts and filters to brake systems and electrical components. Whether you're performing routine maintenance or addressing specific issues, we offer practical and affordable options that meet or exceed OEM specifications. Our auto parts collection features reliable quality, easy installation, and excellent value, ensuring your vehicle performs at its best. From oil filters and spark plugs to suspension components and lighting systems, discover trusted parts that maintain your vehicle's reliability and performance. Whether you're a DIY mechanic or a professional technician, explore our selection of auto parts designed to keep your vehicle in top condition while maintaining factory-direct pricing.

Enhance your RV experience with our comprehensive selection of accessories designed to improve comfort, convenience, and functionality on every journey. Our range includes essential add-ons and upgrades that make RV living more enjoyable, from leveling blocks and stabilizer jacks to water management systems and security devices. Whether you're a new RV owner or a seasoned traveler, we offer practical and affordable options sourced directly from manufacturers. Our RV accessories collection focuses on quality, durability, and ease of use, ensuring every product enhances your mobile lifestyle. From sewer hoses and electrical adapters to interior organization solutions and outdoor entertainment equipment, discover reliable gear that makes RV travel more comfortable and stress-free. Whether you're planning weekend getaways or extended adventures, explore our selection of RV accessories designed to maximize your enjoyment on the road while maintaining factory-direct pricing.

RV TRAVEL SHOP was created with a simple goal: make motorhome and van equipment accessible to everyone at a fair price.

We work with numerous brands and manufacturers directly from specialized factories, notably through trusted platforms such as AliExpress. By sourcing as close to the production line as possible, we are able to offer factory-level prices while providing a wide selection of accessories for your nomadic journeys.

What We Offer

Our catalog covers a broad range of needs for the "Van Life," including:

• Technical equipment and onboard power systems
• Kitchen accessories and interior outfitting
• Camping gear and outdoor furniture
• Water, heating, and sanitation solutions
• Storage and space optimization for vans

Our Approach

Instead of focusing on expensive marketing budgets or unnecessary intermediaries, RV TRAVEL SHOP prioritizes value, variety, and accessibility. This approach allows us to offer competitive pricing without compromising on the practicality and utility of our products.

We carefully select our items based on traveler demand, durability, and community feedback, ensuring we always meet the real-world needs of life on the road.

Our Philosophy

RV TRAVEL SHOP is for weekend warriors, digital nomads, and freedom seekers looking for reliable gear at the right price, without paying for unjustified markups.

Drive more. Explore more. Pay less.
That’s the RV TRAVEL SHOP philosophy.
RV TRAVEL SHOP | Camping Car & Van Equipment at Factory Prices
Shop quality van life and motorhome equipment. From solar kits to kitchen gear, get factory prices for your adventures. Drive more, pay less!

Excellent service! I ordered a rooftop car tent and I’m extremely satisfied. The quality is outstanding, the delivery was fast, and the packaging was secure. The tent is exactly as described—strong, comfortable, and very easy to set up. It has completely upgraded our road trips and camping experience. I highly recommend it without hesitation.

Excellent value for money. I bought a gas heater for my camper van and it fully matches the description. The heater is efficient, reliable, and well built, providing fast and consistent warmth even in cold conditions. Delivery was on time, the packaging was secure, and the product exceeded my expectations.

Perfect! I ordered outdoor camping chairs and I’m very satisfied. The quality is excellent, the price is competitive, and the delivery went smoothly. The chairs are sturdy, comfortable, and well designed, making them ideal for camping, road trips, and outdoor use. I will definitely be back!

Responsive customer service and quality product. I had a quick question before ordering and received a prompt and helpful reply. The inflatable mattress perfectly matches the photos and description. The build quality is excellent, it inflates easily, and it’s very comfortable for sleeping. It performed exactly as expected and made our camping nights much more enjoyable. Very satisfied with my purchase!

Delivery times vary depending on your location and the seller. Generally, standard delivery takes between 15 and 30 business days. Some sellers offer express delivery (7-15 days) for an additional fee. You can check the exact delivery times on each AliExpress product page before placing your order.

AliExpress accepts several secure payment methods: credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, bank transfer, and other methods depending on your country. All payments are secure and protected by AliExpress's Buyer Protection system. You will only be charged once your order has shipped.
Is there a warranty on the products?

Yes, all products sold on AliExpress are covered by the AliExpress Buyer Guarantee. This guarantee covers defective products, products that do not match the description, or products that were not received. You generally have 15 days after receipt to open a dispute if necessary. In addition, many sellers offer their own extended warranties (6 months, 1 year, etc.), which you can find on the product page.
What should I do if there's a problem with my order?

If you encounter a problem (defective product, not received, non-compliant), you can open a dispute directly from your AliExpress account in the "My Orders" section. AliExpress customer service will assist you in resolving the issue. Most disputes are resolved quickly, often in your favor if you provide the necessary evidence (photos, description of the problem).
Are the products authentic and of good quality?

We select only quality products from verified and positively rated sellers on AliExpress. Each product displays customer reviews and ratings, allowing you to check the quality before purchasing. We recommend reading reviews and checking photos shared by customers to ensure the product meets your expectations.
